original_title: Pasadena Roof Orchestra - Live In London
overview: For over 30 years the Pasadena Roof Orchestra has achieved a rare level of energy and style in a musical genre usually relegated to the realms of nostalgia. The group has gained loyal fans across the globe, and this release sees them play to a home-ground of enthusiastic followers in London.
title: Pasadena Roof Orchestra - Live In London
